name: intgr-orpon.yml
configuration:
spring:
  data:
    solr:
      host: "http://10.28.97.90:8081/solr"
  application:
    name: nttm-intgr-orpon
  jmx:
    enabled: false
management:
  endpoints:
    web:
      path-mapping:
        prometheus: metrics
      base-path: /
      exposure:
        include: prometheus
  health.solr.enabled: false
logging:
  config: classpath:log4j2-dev.yaml
  level:
    org.hibernate: error
    org.hibernate.SQL: error
    org.zalando.logbook: info
logbook:
  format:
    style: http
  exclude:
    - "**/metrics"
